title: Gabrielle Union twins with daughter in throwback 'Bring It On' cheerleader costumes
text:
Gabrielle Union brought back a beloved character from her past -- with a twist -- to celebrate Halloween this year.

Interested in Halloween? Add Halloween as an interest to stay up to date on the latest Halloween news, video, and analysis from ABC News. Add Interest

The actress, 46, dressed up as her character from the 2000 hit "Bring It On," Isis, the captain of the East Compton Clovers, with her 11-month-old daughter, Kaavia James Union Wade.

Union shared some adorable snaps of the twinning costumes on Instagram, captioning her post, "Brought It. #CaliforniaLove."

She also shared a video featuring scenes from the movie and the instantly-recognizable cheer from the film, "Brr! It's Cold In Here!"

"Ice Ice Ice... Its COLD asf #BringItOn #CaliforniaLove" she captioned the video.

Actress Taraji P. Henson summed up thoughts on the matching costumes in the best way.

"Y’all won Halloween 😩😂😂😂💪🏾🙏🏾💋💋💋" she commented.
description: The actress, 46, dressed up as her character from the 2000 hit
